programme.title: Good Hair, (2009, Documentary)
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: The Lighthouse, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: Tell, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A small-time thief (Milo Ventimiglia) makes a big score and tries to keep it from his ex-partner, his ex-wife and other greedy sorts.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Big Miracle, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: Lady Bird, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: Veronica Mars, (2014, Mystery)
programme.desc: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: Blue Beetle, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Jaime Reyes finds himself in possession of an ancient relic of alien biotechnology called the Scarab. When the Scarab chooses Jaime to be its symbiotic host, he's bestowed with a suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary and unpredictable powers.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A vengeful sheriff and two bounty hunters track a murderous family (Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon Zombie) on the run.

programme.title: Anthropoid, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Good Time, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bank robber stops at nothing to free his brother from prison, launching himself into a nightlong odyssey through New York's dark and dangerous criminal underworld.

programme.title: Taking Woodstock, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elliot Tiber plays a pivotal role in the generation-defining concert by helping to secure Max Yasgur's farm as a venue and offering his parents' motel as a base for organizers.

programme.title: Taking Woodstock, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elliot Tiber plays a pivotal role in the generation-defining concert by helping to secure Max Yasgur's farm as a venue and offering his parents' motel as a base for organizers.

programme.title: Vampires Suck, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Twilight" and other films, a pale vampire and a muscular werewolf try to win the heart of a beautiful teen.

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke, (2016, Animated)
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: Nine Lives, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: A workaholic billionaire (Kevin Spacey) tries to communicate with his family when a bizarre turn of events traps him inside the body of a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants.

programme.title: Everything, Everything, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Confined to her house due to an illness, a smart and imaginative 18-year-old (Amandla Stenberg) develops a budding romance with the teen (Nick Robinson) who lives next door.

programme.title: Margaret, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Feeling responsible for a fatal traffic accident, a high-school student lashes out when her attempts to make amends meet with opposition.

programme.title: Jonah Hex, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Jonah Hex has one foot in the natural world and one in the supernatural. His unusual nature gives him the ability to track down anyone, so the Army makes him an offer. It will erase the warrants on his head if he finds Quentin Turnbull.

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: Low Tide, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenager Alan and his younger brother find a bag of gold coins in a dead man's island home, they try to hide it from their friends -- but one of them, suspicious and violently unpredictable, is willing to do anything to get the money.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After traveling to a remote location in the Swiss Alps, a Wall Street stockbroker (Dane DeHaan) unravels the terrifying secrets of a mysterious spa where guests never leave.

programme.title: The Lovers, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: A man and his wife, each embroiled in an extramarital affair, are sent reeling when they suddenly fall for the least likely person imaginable -- each other.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The resourceful detective (Robert Downey Jr.) and his astute partner, Dr. Watson (Jude Law), meet a powerful criminal, a devotee of black magic who arises from his grave.

programme.title: American Ultra, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When his secret past comes back to haunt him, a small-town stoner (Jesse Eisenberg) must use his latent, deadly skills to prevent the CIA from taking him out.

programme.title: American Ultra, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When his secret past comes back to haunt him, a small-town stoner (Jesse Eisenberg) must use his latent, deadly skills to prevent the CIA from taking him out.

programme.title: Jonah Hex, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Jonah Hex has one foot in the natural world and one in the supernatural. His unusual nature gives him the ability to track down anyone, so the Army makes him an offer. It will erase the warrants on his head if he finds Quentin Turnbull.

programme.title: Knight and Day, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple (Zach Galifianakis, Isla Fisher) discover it's not easy keeping up with their gorgeous and ultra-sophisticated new neighbors, the Joneses, especially when they discover that Mr. and Mrs. Jones are really covert operatives.

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: Home Again, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: Separated from her husband, Alice lets three young men -- Harry, George and Teddy -- stay in her guesthouse. As Alice develops a budding romance with Harry, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex shows up with a suitcase in his hand.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth, (2020, Documentary)
programme.desc: In 1991 eight visionaries embark on a two-year experiment to quarantine themselves inside Biosphere 2 -- a self-engineered replica of Earth's ecosystem.

programme.title: The Boss, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: After her release from prison, a former CEO (Melissa McCarthy) battles old enemies while trying to build a brownie empire with her ex-assistant (Kristen Bell).

programme.title: Superman: Unbound, (2013, Animated)
programme.desc: Superman (Matt Bomer) battles Brainiac (John Noble) to save the Krypton city of Kandor, which is miniaturized and held aboard Brainiac's ship.

programme.title: The Secrets We Keep, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: In post-World War II America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

programme.title: Warcraft, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A king (Dominic Cooper), a mighty warrior (Travis Fimmel) and a powerful wizard (Ben Foster) unite to defend the human realm of Azeroth from a tyrannical shaman (Daniel Wu) and his invading army of orcs.

programme.title: Black Adam, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Bestowed with the almighty powers of the gods, Black Adam's unique form of justice, born out of rage, is challenged by modern-day heroes who form the Justice Society: Hawkman, Dr. Fate, Atom Smasher and Cyclone.

programme.title: D...: The Musical, (2023, Musical)
programme.desc: Two self-obsessed businessmen discover they're long-lost identical twins and come together to plot the reunion of their divorced parents.

programme.title: St. Vincent, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between a single woman's 12-year-old son (Jaeden Lieberher) and the boozy misanthrope (Bill Murray) who lives next door.

programme.title: Gifted, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A man (Chris Evans) wages a legal battle against his mother (Lindsay Duncan) for custody of his orphaned niece (Mckenna Grace), a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: Gifted, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A man (Chris Evans) wages a legal battle against his mother (Lindsay Duncan) for custody of his orphaned niece (Mckenna Grace), a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn), (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Harley Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask and every other thug in Gotham. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding, (2024, Thriller)
programme.desc: A bodybuilder heading through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: Sully, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: After landing US Airways Flight 1549 in New York's Hudson River, Capt. Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger (Tom Hanks) faces an investigation that threatens to destroy his career and reputation.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: Four travelers take refuge in the home of a clan of demented killers. Written and directed by musician Rob Zombie.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: Confidence, (2003, Crime Story)
programme.desc: A con man (Edward Burns) and his crew swindle a gangster's accountant, then try to repay him by stealing from a crooked banker.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lieutenant general (Alan Rickman) and a colonel (Helen Mirren) face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Dream Scenario, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A family man finds his life turned upside down when millions of strangers suddenly start seeing him in their dreams. However, when his nighttime appearances take a nightmarish turn, he's forced to navigate the consequences of his newfound stardom.

programme.title: House Party, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Aspiring club promoters and best buds Damon and Kevin need a huge windfall to make their problems go away. They decide to host the party of the year at an exclusive mansion, which just happens to belong to none other than NBA superstar LeBron James.

programme.title: The Exception, (2016, History)
programme.desc: During World War II, a soldier (Jai Courtney) travels to a secluded mansion to investigate a mysterious German monarch. He soon finds himself entangled in a web of deceit while having a dangerous love affair with a local Jewish woman (Lily James).

programme.title: Good Hair, (2009, Documentary)
programme.desc: Comic Chris Rock explores how hairstyles affect the self-esteem, activities and relationships of African-Americans.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Emily Bronte's Cathy (Juliette Binoche) and Heathcliff (Ralph Fiennes) fuel two generations of gothic romance on the Yorkshire moors.

programme.title: Ben-Hur, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: A prince (Jack Huston) endures years of slavery to take vengeance on his adopted brother (Toby Kebbell), a Roman officer who falsely accused him of treason.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: When Chris Vaughn returns to his hometown to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed and the town's big business is now a casino. Aided by his friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption.

programme.title: The Delta Force, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Terrorists reroute a passenger jet from Athens to Beirut, where commandos (Chuck Norris, Lee Marvin) are waiting to negotiate.

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A killer stalks North Carolina teens (Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe) who disposed of an auto accident's live victim.

programme.title: Transformers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

programme.title: In the Land of Saints and Sinners, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: Hoping to leave his dark past behind him, former assassin Finbar Murphy leads a quiet life in a coastal Irish town. However, when terrorists show up, he must soon choose between exposing his secret identity and defending his friends and neighbors.

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.title: The Beekeeper, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: One man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after it's revealed he's a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: The Matrix, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Adventure)
programme.desc: A daredevil aviator (Jude Law) and an ace reporter (Gwyneth Paltrow) fight an evil mastermind and his army of gigantic robots.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: "Sex Life" takes an erotic journey into the world of Japanese rope bondage; how a throuple lives, works, plays and incorporates a friend; a dominatrix helps a couple unlock their sexual secrets.

programme.title: A Chorus Line, (1985, Musical)
programme.desc: Dancers auditioning for a musical reveal their innermost thoughts and desires in this adaptation of the Broadway show.

programme.title: A Chorus Line, (1985, Musical)
programme.desc: Dancers auditioning for a musical reveal their innermost thoughts and desires in this adaptation of the Broadway show.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie, (2023, Animated)
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol pups magically gain superpowers after a meteor strikes Adventure City. However, things take a turn for the worse when Humdinger and a mad scientist steal their powers and turn themselves into supervillains.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture, (1979, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Adm. Kirk (William Shatner), Mr. Spock (Leonard Nimoy), Dr. McCoy (DeForest Kelley) and crew embark in the overhauled Enterprise to find an intelligent entity called VGER.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Kirk (William Shatner), Spock (Leonard Nimoy) and the Enterprise crew battle an old foe (Ricardo Montalban) who blames Kirk for the death of his wife.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Kirk (William Shatner) and the crew steal the old Enterprise and head for Vulcan to reunite the mind and body of Mr. Spock.

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Spock (Leonard Nimoy), Kirk (William Shatner) and the Enterprise time-travel to modern-day San Francisco to bring humpback whales to the 23rd century.

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A renegade Vulcan makes Kirk (William Shatner), Spock (Leonard Nimoy), McCoy (DeForest Kelley) and the Enterprise go to a planet at the center of the galaxy.

programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country, (1991, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Kirk (William Shatner), Spock (Leonard Nimoy), McCoy (DeForest Kelley) and the Enterprise encounter sabotage on the way to peace talks with the Klingon Federation.

programme.title: Star Trek, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Young James T. Kirk (Chris Pine), Spock (Zachary Quinto) and the rest of the Enterprise crew embark on a collision course with a vengeful Romulan.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After an act of terrorism leaves him with a personal score to settle, Capt. Kirk (Chris Pine) defies Starfleet regulations and leads his crew (Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Zoë Saldana) on a mission to capture a powerfully destructive force.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Left stranded after an attack in space, Kirk (Chris Pine), Spock (Zachary Quinto) and the rest of the crew must battle a deadly alien race while trying to find a way off their hostile planet.

programme.title: Blow Out, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A sound man (John Travolta) re-creates a political murder-by-car-crash with a sight-and-sound montage.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Seaton Smith performs a set loaded with relationship advice and "white positive" jokes; Yedoye Travis also covers race relations while making the argument that the devil is actually white.

programme.title: The Long Riders, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: The Jesse James-Cole Younger gang leaves a trail of emptied banks, plundered stagecoaches and dead bodies in its wake.

programme.title: The Long Riders, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: The Jesse James-Cole Younger gang leaves a trail of emptied banks, plundered stagecoaches and dead bodies in its wake.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, (1957, Western)

programme.title: MacGyver, (2021)
programme.sub-title: Royalty + Marriage + Vivaah Sanskar + Zinc + Henna
programme.desc: Mac, Desi and Russ go under cover during a royal Indian wedding to protect a princess whose policies could put her life in danger; Bozer suspects Riley is up to her old hacking ways.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2021)
programme.sub-title: Barn Find + Engine Oil + La Punzonatura + Lab Rats + Tachometer
programme.desc: Mac and the team delve into the world of Italian car culture to track down a crime boss; Mac must lean on Desi when he discovers that he's losing the ability to control his hands; Mac and Desi move in together.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2021)
programme.sub-title: H2O + Orthophosphates + Mission City + Corrosion + Origins
programme.desc: Mac and Desi travel with Bozer to his childhood home when his aunt dies in a tragic accident; they soon discover she may have been murdered for trying to expose the city's contaminated water supply.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2021)
programme.desc: Mac and Riley go missing and wake up 24 hours later in a cornfield with no memory of how they got there; they must unravel the mystery and find out how to get rid of the nanotrackers in their bodies, no matter the cost.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2016)
programme.desc: Special agents for the Department of External Services, Angus "Mac" MacGyver and Jack Dalton, work to recover a missing bioweapon.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2016)
programme.desc: MacGyver and the team attempt to rescue Jack's former CIA partner who went missing in Venezuela after finding evidence to take down an international arms dealer.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2016)
programme.desc: In Malaysia, MacGyver and the team extract a terrorist group's money man who has intel on an impending attack, but when the man is shot, MacGyver must keep him alive in order to learn the terrorists' plans.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2016)
programme.desc: Mac and Jack work with a Russian bomb programmer and his alienated handler to defuse a Soviet-era warhead in Moscow; when the antiquated computer breaks down, Mac must find a way to fix it.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2017)
programme.sub-title: Oni Kalalea Ke Ku a Ka La'au Loa
programme.desc: Danny tells Charlie a bedtime story about a case involving bad Santas and a holiday miracle.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.desc: When an FBI agent who was cracking down on organized crime is killed, McGarrett rounds up every gang-related criminal on the island to find the culprit responsible for the murder.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.sub-title: O Ka Mea Ua Hala, Ua Hala Ia.
programme.desc: Grover must prevent a man who is accused of killing his wife from committing suicide.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.desc: The corpse of a diamond smuggler is stolen from a graveyard; Five-0 tracks down his partner, who is determined to retrieve their latest batch of contraband; Adam recruits a new, confidential informant; Tani gets a devastating call.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.desc: McGarrett and Danny investigate the murder of a private detective whose client was killed the same way; Adam sends Jessie into a dangerous situation with disastrous consequences; Danny's uncle comes to town to help with the restaurant.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.sub-title: O Na Hoku O Ka Lani Wale No Kai 'Ike I Kahi O Pae
programme.desc: Tani and Junior go under cover as prospective parents to infiltrate a private school where the headmaster was murdered; Adam's life is on the line when he is held captive and forced to produce a massive amount of money.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.sub-title: Holapu Ke Ahi, Koe Iho Ka Lehu
programme.desc: Adam's mission to take down organized crime goes sideways when the bait he uses falls into the wrong hands; Adam begins to doubt Jessie's allegiance.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.desc: The ex-wife of the man who shot Danny reveals how Danny helped save her life; Tani and Junior are assigned to walk the beat as uniformed officers for the day; Adam is framed for the murder of the crime boss he has been tracking.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.sub-title: Aohe Mea Make I Ka Hewa; Make No I Ka Mihi Ole
programme.desc: A hit man McGarrett's father failed to arrest comes to McGarrett to finally confess his crimes and admit where he buried his victims; Jessie makes a dangerous decision that could ruin Adam's life.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.sub-title: He Lokomaika'i Ka Manu O Kaiona
programme.desc: Catherine Rollins recruits McGarrett and Jerry to help track down uranium thought to be hidden on an abandoned Hawaiian island before a terrorist makes dirty bombs with it; Junior gets trapped in a ravine.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0, (2018)
programme.desc: Harry Langford enlists McGarrett and Danny's help to track down a teenage British royal who has run away while under his protection; Grover, Tani and Junior work a 25-year-old murder case after a mysterious videotape arrives at headquarters.

programme.title: Blood, Sweat and Terrors, (2018)

programme.title: Deadsight, (2018)
programme.desc: A pregnant police officer and a blind man fight for their lives against swarms of the living dead.

programme.title: Nobody Gets Out Alive, (2013)
programme.desc: Hunter's (Brian Gallagher) life turns upside down after his daughter is killed by a drunken driver. He disappears into the woods, and no one sees him for years -- until several partying teenagers are brutally killed one by one.

programme.title: Asmodexia, (2014)
programme.desc: In Barcelona, an exorcist (Luís Marco) and his teenage granddaughter (Clàudia Pons) cast out demons while trying to elude the grasp of the cultists who are stalking them.

programme.title: The Pact, (2012)
programme.desc: Disturbing visions and her sister's disappearance lead a woman (Caity Lotz) to call a cop (Casper Van Dien) and a psychic to her childhood home.

programme.title: The Pact II, (2014)

programme.title: The Colony, (2013)
programme.desc: Forced to live underground, survivors of an ice age embark on a mission to reach another outpost.

programme.title: Trick, (2019)
programme.desc: A detective tries to track down a masked killer who reappears every Halloween to wreak bloody havoc.

programme.title: The Midnight Man, (2016)
programme.desc: A girl plays a game with her friends and summons the creature known as the Midnight Man, who uses their worst fears against them.

programme.title: Wildling, (2018)
programme.desc: After a childhood in captivity under the care of a man who taught her to fear the outside world, a young woman sees her new freedom shattered by a series of unsettling events.

programme.title: God's Country, (2022)

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial disfarçado se aproxima de seu inimigo. Ela decide deixar um agente de confiança entrar em campo, mas tem dúvidas se ela tem o que é preciso para completar a missão.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito.

programme.title: A Perseguição, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: Ottway trabalha em um lugar isolado no Alasca. Certo dia, quando retornava à cidade para matar a saudade da esposa, o avião cai. Feridos e sem alimentos, os sobreviventes lutam pela vida e tentam reencontrar a civilização.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador, (2015, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança!

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Joe é um assassino que está na Tailândia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos são inimigos de Surat, um chefão do crime local. Para não ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da prisão, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da máfia. Mas quando o plano dá errado, o casal tenta fugir para o México.

programme.title: Vingança, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Um ex-agente antinarcóticos vai atrás do responsável pelo assassinato de sua esposa, a líder de uma organização criminosa.

programme.title: Dose Dupla, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: Jogo Assassino, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A polícia prende um psicopata que está ligado a vários sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura será apenas o início de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vítimas.

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria.

programme.title: O Sequestro do Ônibus 657, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um pai não tem meios para pagar o tratamento médico da filha. Como último recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas dão errado, eles são forçados a sequestrar um ônibus da cidade.

programme.title: Congo, (1995, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando uma expedição desaparece no Congo, um grupo é enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Redenção, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida.

programme.title: Dose Dupla, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: Jogo Assassino, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A polícia prende um psicopata que está ligado a vários sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura será apenas o início de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vítimas.

programme.title: Instinto Predador, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Frank capturou animais selvagens na selva brasileira, incluindo uma onça branca de 400 libras. Ele a envia no mesmo navio que um assassino preso. O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais.

programme.title: Antes Só Do Que Mal Acompanhado, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: Neal só que voltar para Chicago e passar o Dia de Ação de Graças com sua família. Mas ele só se dá mal. Tudo culpa de Del Griffith — um vendedor desbocado que leva Neal a uma busca sem sentido.

programme.title: Um Tira da Pesada 3, (1994, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Axel Foley viaja de volta a Beverly Hills para um passeio emocionante de montanha-russa no parque de diversões Wonderworld! Acompanhado pelos velhos amigos Billy Rosewood e Serge, Axel se torna a nova atração enquanto persegue os bandidos.

programme.title: Bem-Vindo à Selva, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um funcionário que é vítima de bullying deve libertar sua besta interior depois que um retiro de equipe na selva dá errado.

programme.title: Tudo por um Furo, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: A espera acabou! Ron Burgundy está de volta! Depois de perder o emprego, Ron reúne a equipe de notícias e enfrenta um novo rival

programme.title: Penalidade Máxima, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Danny Meehan (Vinnie Jones) é um verdadeiro ídolo do futebol inglês.Entretanto, Danny perde tudo o que conquistou em sua carreira pós ter sido acusado de manipular o resultado de um jogo.

programme.title: Fixação, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Carlos, um profissional bem sucedido vê sua rotina modificada após escutar uma música e ser atacado pelo fenômeno de Earworm.

programme.title: Um Vampiro no Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: O excêntrico vampiro Maximillian viaja até Nova York para procurar uma esposa e dar continuidade à sua linhagem. Lá ele conhece a bela detetive Rita que ele acredita ser a descendente de uma ordem de vampiros.

programme.title: Desventuras do Verão, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: As férias em família durante o verão de 1985 mudam tudo para um adolescente obcecado por pingue-pongue.

programme.title: Carros Usados, Vendedores Pirados!, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Don Ready (Jeremy Piven) e sua louca equipe de negociadores têm apenas um fim de semana para se livrar de mais de 200 carros e provar que, quando se trata de persuasão, conspiração e todo tipo de mau comportamento, eles manjam do negócio!

programme.title: Um Colégio muito Maluco, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Em uma escola secundária onde o uso de drogas aumentou, o diretor decide reduzir o uso de drogas realizando um teste de drogas em todos. Dois alunos com medo de dar positivo têm a ideia de que todos vão dar positivo para comer bolos com maconha.

programme.title: Antes Só Do Que Mal Acompanhado, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: Neal só que voltar para Chicago e passar o Dia de Ação de Graças com sua família. Mas ele só se dá mal. Tudo culpa de Del Griffith — um vendedor desbocado que leva Neal a uma busca sem sentido.

programme.title: A Filha do General, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois investigadores do Exército revelam um escândalo multilateral quando provam o assassinato brutal de um oficial.

programme.title: A Grande Guerra, (2019, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Durante os últimos dias da Primeira Guerra Mundial, um grupo de soldados dos EUA é enviado para trás das linhas inimigas para resgatar um pelotão perdido.

programme.title: A Pele de Vênus, (2014, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Uma atriz tenta convencer um diretor de que ela é perfeita para um papel em sua próxima produção.

programme.title: Kursk - A Última Missão, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O filme narra a explosão e o naufrágio do submarino russo Kursk no ano de 2000. Os tripulantes precisam sobreviver às águas geladas do Mar de Barents enquanto esperam por um resgate que pode não chegar por causa do descaso das autoridades.

programme.title: Conspiração Americana, (2011, Crime)
programme.desc: Mary Surratt é a única mulher acusada como cúmplice no julgamento do assassinato de Abraham Lincoln. Enquanto toda a nação se volta contra ela, ela é forçada a confiar em seu advogado relutante para descobrir a verdade e salvar sua vida.

programme.title: A Última Profecia, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um repórter é atraído para uma pequena cidade da Virgínia Ocidental para investigar uma série de ocorrências estranhas, incluindo visões psíquicas e o aparecimento de entidades estranhas.

programme.title: Escobar: Paraíso Perdido, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Quando um jovem surfista começa um relacionamento com a sobrinha do traficante Pablo Escobar, ele encontra sua vida em risco após ser levado para o perigoso mundo dos negócios da família de Escobar.

programme.title: K-PAX: O Caminho da Luz, (2002, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Um estranho surge do nada, após uma confusão numa estação ferroviária. Afirmando ser de um planeta distante, K-Pax, Prot desafia cientistas e chama a atenção do Dr. Powell, cujo ceticismo inicial rapidamente se transforma em fascínio e espanto.

programme.title: O Espelho, (2014, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: Uma mulher tenta exonerar seu irmão, condenado por assassinato, provando que o crime foi cometido por um fenômeno sobrenatural.

programme.title: Jessabelle: O Passado Nunca Morre, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma jovem é forçada a voltar para a casa de seu pai, na Louisiana, quando um acidente de trânsito a deixa incapacitada, sem poder usar as pernas.

programme.title: Fantasmas de Guerra, (2020, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco experientes soldados americanos são designados para defender um castelo francês perto do final da Segunda Guerra Mundial.

programme.title: Segredos Malignos, (2014, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Enquanto caminhava para casa depois de uma consulta obstétrica, Esther é brutalmente atacada e desfigurada por um agressor encapuzado.

programme.title: Viagem para o Inferno, (2018, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: O que começa como as férias da vida de um grupo de jovens, se transforma em uma luta pela sobrevivência quando descobrem uma loja abandonada. Caçados um a um por uma ameaça desconhecida, eles devem lutar e aprender a trabalhar juntos, para sobreviver.

programme.title: Uma Noite Apavorante, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um casal experiente se envolve com uma gangue de criminosos endurecidos após sobreviver a um ataque de um psicopata assassino.

programme.title: O Espelho, (2014, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: Uma mulher tenta exonerar seu irmão, condenado por assassinato, provando que o crime foi cometido por um fenômeno sobrenatural.

programme.title: Jessabelle: O Passado Nunca Morre, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma jovem é forçada a voltar para a casa de seu pai, na Louisiana, quando um acidente de trânsito a deixa incapacitada, sem poder usar as pernas.

programme.title: Pânico na Neve, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Três esquiadores presos em um teleférico são forçados a tomar decisões de vida ou morte, o que é mais perigoso do que ficar e morrer de frio.

programme.title: Antes Que o Diabo Saiba Que Você Está Morto, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Andy e seu irmão Hank estão com problemas financeiros. Eles organizam um assalto a uma pequena joalheria para para saírem dessa situação de forma rápida e sem causar vítimas. O crime começa a dar errado quando descobrem que a loja pertence aos seus pais.

programme.title: Equilibrium, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Num futuro incerto, a raça humana foi quase totalmente devastada da Terra. Para salvar o mundo, os governantes decidiram criar uma droga capaz de inibir o sentimento humano e garantir a paz para sempre.

programme.title: Vingança sem Limites, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Quando Sandy, uma prostituta de luxo é encontrada morta, seu protetor Jake fica inconformado e só pensa em vingança. Ele a amava, e agora ele não vai sossegar enquanto não encontrar seu assassino.

programme.title: Refém do Espírito, (2008, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Ainda que em legítima defesa, Marnie Watson é sentenciada por matar o marido, mas recebe liberdade condicional sob a condição de usar uma tornozeleira eletrônica.

programme.title: Assassinato em Gosford Park, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: Na Inglaterra dos anos 30, um grupo de arrogantes ricos e famosos se reúne para um fim de semana de descanso em um resort de caça. Mas, quando ocorre um assassinato, cada um desses personagens interessantes se torna suspeito.

programme.title: O Viajante, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma noite de véspera de Natal lenta e tranquila na delegacia se transforma em um estranho horror quando um homem entra dizendo que quer confessar um assassinato.

programme.title: Premonições, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Linda Hanson é uma mulher suburbana que um dia é avisada que seu marido, Jim, morreu em um terrível desastre automobilístico. Porém, ao acordar no dia seguinte, tudo está perfeitamente normal em sua vida e Jim está vivo.

programme.title: Na Mira dos Assassinos, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma gangue de ladrões fugindo após roubar um banco corre para um acampamento familiar. Aproveitando a ocasião, os criminosos vão esconder o dinheiro roubado no carro enquanto descansam.

programme.title: A Arma, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Dallas é uma máquina de matar. Seus ataques a gangues de motociclistas e laboratórios de metanfetamina irritam o chefe da máfia de Las Vegas, que sequestra sua namorada. Dallas não irá parar até que a justiça seja feita.

programme.title: E Agora? A Mamãe Saiu de Férias! 2... E Levou a Família, (2019, Children)
programme.desc: Carlo é casado e tem dois filhos, está desempregado e tem uma vida insatisfatória. Sua esposa Giulia, tem uma oferta de emprego na Suécia dias antes do Natal. Por conta disso a família decide usar a velha van para tirar férias e ir até o país destinado.

programme.title: Desejo de Natal, (2022, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Sem dinheiro e abandonada pelo marido com três filhos, Martha não está tendo o melhor fim de ano da sua vida. Mas ela muda de cidade e redescobre a esperança quando encontra um emprego e uma rede de apoio em uma pacata lanchonete de interior.

programme.title: Encontrando o Amor em Nebraska, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine, uma garota californiana, herda um rancho na pequena cidade de Valentine, em Nebraska. Antes de vender a propriedade, ela decide passar o verão no rancho e aprender mais sobre sua família.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Minha Vida, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Uma jovem adolescente rica e mimada está prestes a descobrir que o verdadeiro valor não está nas etiquetas de preços e "coisas", mas nos atos gentis de ajudar os outros, tudo com a mão amiga de um anjo da guarda.
